description:
Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI) calculator
PAIesque calculates

- a score that mimics the official Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI), and
- the resting heart rate (RHR) to provide comprehensive fitness tracking.

PAI translates heart rate data into a simple, scientifically-validated score, while RHR monitoring helps track your cardiovascular health progress.

You need to install and configure Gadgetbridge to read heart rate data from fitness trackers and smartwatches.
